    • Constructor Detail

      • CPSO

        public CPSO(int dimensionSize,
            int maxLoops,
            int swarmSize,
            double Inertia,
            double c1,
            double c2,
            int numSwarms,
            boolean Delaunay,
            int function,
            javax.swing.JTextArea op)
        Create a CPSO
        Parameters:
        dimensionSize - the overall dimension size
        maxLoops - the max loops to perform
        swarmSize - the number of particles in each swarm
        Inertia - the effect the current velocity has on its next (0-1)
        c1 - the effect the personal best has on the next velocity
        c2 - the effect that the global (or network) best has on the future velocity
        numSwarms - the number of swarms to create
        Delaunay - determines if you are using delaunay triangulation or not
        function - determines which function it is optimizing
        op - the output to push the i/o to

      • CPSO

        public CPSO(int dimensionSize,
            int maxLoops,
            int swarmSize,
            double Inertia,
            double c1,
            double c2,
            int numSwarms,
            boolean Delaunay,
            int function)
        Create a CPSO
        Parameters:
        dimensionSize - the overall dimension size
        maxLoops - the max loops to perform
        swarmSize - the number of particles in each swarm
        Inertia - the effect the current velocity has on its next (0-1)
        c1 - the effect the personal best has on the next velocity
        c2 - the effect that the global (or network) best has on the future velocity
        numSwarms - the number of swarms to create
        Delaunay - determines if you are using delaunay triangulation or not
        function - determines which function it is optimizing

      • InitializeSwarms

        public void InitializeSwarms(boolean random)
        Creates the swarms
        Parameters:
        random - notes if the swarm should be built with random sizes or with identical swarm sizes

      • UpdateBests

        public void UpdateBests(double fitness,
                        Particle p,
                        Swarm swarm)
        Takes the new fitness and particle and determine if it is the new global best and or personal best
        Parameters:
        fitness - the new fitness value
        p - the particle that is being updated
        swarm - the swarm that particle is from

        public void UpdateSolution()
        Update to the best current solution by taking the global best values

        public double getSolutionFitness()
        Adds the best solutions into temp and calculate the fitness
        Returns:
        the fitness of the global best values

      • CalculateFitness

        public double CalculateFitness(int index,
                               double[] position,
                               int numSwarms)
        Calculate the fitness of the current swarm
        Parameters:
        position - the current position
        index - the index the position starts from
        numSwarms - the number of swarms in the cpso
        Returns:
        the fitness of after the new value

      • CalculateFinalFitness

        public double CalculateFinalFitness(double[] values)
        Returns the final fitness based on the solution function
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        fitness
